contest-event.event-date:
July 3, 1954 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Pittencrieff Park, Dunfermline, Fife, Scotland, UK Open Contest Champions: Bowhill Colliery FCBA 'A Band' Champions: Bowhill Colliery Best section 2 band - Alloa Burgh. Best section 3 band - Buckhaven Miners. Best section 4 band - Burntisland Burgh. Deportment 1st Cupar Town, 2nd Scottish Gas Board.
The first 6 bands played outside, but owing to the atrocious weather the final 7 bands moved inside the hall in the grounds of Pittencrief Park.
Nov. 7, 2011, 4:19 p.m. April 17, 2019, 8:07 p.m.
1 Bowhill Colliery and District Silver Band Drake Rimmer
2 Tullis Russell Mills Drake Rimmer
3 Govan Burgh Gregor Grant
4 Hetton Silver Band George Scorer
5 Alloa Burgh Charles Telfer
6 Bellshill & District Concert Brass Dugald MacBrayne
Unknown Result Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd Unknown
Unknown Result Brechin City Unknown
Unknown Result Buckhaven and District Miners' F. Connell
Unknown Result Burntisland Silver David Briggs
Unknown Result Cupar Town Drake Rimmer
Unknown Result Lochgelly Band Unknown
Unknown Result Wellesley Colliery Band Unknown
